attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister
attributes.background: It’s simple, there has never been a Prime Minister with so many reasons for the public to have no confidence in their ability to do the job with honesty and integrity. Scandal after scandal…. He is not fit for office.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
